name: Dual Swords City Superhero Sim
description:
Hold your swords tight, attack in cold blood and cut off the heads of your opponents with Dual Swords City Superhero Simulator!
You are the very special superhero from comic books – professional ninja assassin with two katana sword, bad sense of humor and aggressive reactions to danger! Steals money, kill cops and help nice old ladies to go across the lane safety at the same time!
Commit crimes, dodge bullets and enjoy the comics character life – you’re not a villain, but anti-hero now! So, do good deeds and evil crimes alike without doubts! Your playground for today is a large modern megalopolis, filled with hurrying citizens, flying cars, and masses of criminal scum! Robbers, thieves, murderers, pushers – all of them flooded your hometown streets, and you’re one of these awful heroes! Face the rising tide of criminal activity right now!
Check the sharpness of your blades, load your guns – and start your amazing bank robbing journey! Fight cops, scare ordinary citizens, rob shops, and banks and have fun! Mafia enforcers or ordinary cops can’t be dangerous for you! Beware of SWAT, but don’t be scared much – of course, they are many and they have assault rifles, but you can get such gun too!
Earn or steal money to buy armor and new weapons, replenish your amount of rope and repair your armor and jetpack – or buy a new one! It’s good to be a bad guy with high-tech equipment! You can even buy jetpack to fly between skyscrapers and avoids police chases!
Feel like a high-tech equipped night hero with bar moral codex and enjoy Dual Swords City Superhero Simulator!
Dual Swords City Superhero Simulator features:
• Ultimate comics anti-hero simulator
• Wide range of interesting weapons and tools
• Various armor, suits, and jetpacks
• Wonderful 3D graphics
Unsheathe your swords, load your gun and start your adventures right now!
